name: School Grade
description:
You are a bad student and the principal is sick of you. He has to give you your report card but you escape from his office. 

Your mission if you decide to accept it, will be to gain as much time as possible because as you know very well, if your parents see your grades, it's the end for you!

Tip: Run

good luck

move to the right: "→"

jump: "↑"

drop the lockers: "E"
